item.title: Doom-Emacs
item.description: Intro i'm new to eamcs.And now i'm writing this article with `Doom Emacs`.Its really awesome! Using the laptop of win10 and run eamcs in terminal with wsl2. All thing go pretty wellâ€¦ But i'm not familiar with doom eamcs.I don't like remember the key-binding,i prefer remember key-binding by doing some actually jobs. Although doom eamcs has good documents,but i still can not . There are some problems i need to fix i decide to learning it by actually works.
